Pre-Game Insights: The Sacramento Kings will face the Los Angeles Clippers in NBA action at Golden 1 Center on Saturday, beginning at 2:00pm AEDT.
Led by the likes of De'Aaron Fox, DeMar DeRozan and Domantas Sabonis, the Kings are aiming to beat a Clippers side that includes Norman Powell, James Harden and Ivica Zubac.
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model currently gives the Kings a 72% chance of beating the Clippers at Golden 1 Center.
The Kings are listed as 6.5-point favourites against the Clippers, with odds of $1.91 available at Bet365.
The over/under for total points scored is set at 223.5 with Bet365, which has odds of $1.91 for the over and $1.91 for the under.
Stats Insider's predicted final score for Kings vs Clippers at Golden 1 Center on Saturday is the Kings winning 115-109.
De'Aaron Fox is expected to step up for the Kings with 27 points, 5 rebounds and 6 assists, while Norman Powell is projected to have 19 points, 3 rebounds and 2 assists for the Clippers.
